name: GOD ! PLZ, Help me !
description:
In the Global City, gangs reigns ! You and all your friends, are involved in an incoming war. You have no choice but to get them and go to the the shelter, with their number only a divine intervention could help you. And what a luck, after drinking a lot, you started to pray for help, and god answer your call. He will now help you to go through the city and reach your friends.

This is a tactical game where the player is the "god", helping the homeless guy to find out his friends and reach their "home", the shelter, together as a family.

YOU CAN PLAY THE GAME INTO YOUR BROWSER HERE  (You need to have the material acceleration activate) : http://flokami.ovh/perso/game.html

All minor update and fixes will be made on the browser version. The executable will be update only on big adds.
